[[1995â96 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1995â96]] |} [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) [[association football|football]] team has participated in [[Turkish Second Football League]] [[1994â95 Turkish Second Football League|1994â95]] season for the 21st time. MÄ°Y had a bad season in ranking group and could not promote to promotion group and later could not take place in promotion play-offs. The team also participated in [[Turkish Cup]] (''TÃ¼rkiye KupasÄ±'') in [[1994â95 Turkish Cup|1994â95]] and eliminated at Round 3. ==1994â95 league participation== [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group 3 in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1994â95 Turkish Second Football League|1994â95]] season. League played in three stages. In the first stage 50 teams in five groups (10 teams each) played for first two rankings. In the second, promotion group was consisted of those 10 teams. At the end of the second stage top two teams promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] [[1995â96 Turkish First Football League|1995â96]]. Remaining 8 teams in each ranking group played in classification groups, by carrying points and goals from ranking groups. Bottom two teams relegated to [[Turkish Third Football League|Third League]] [[1995â96 Turkish Third Football League|1995â96]] at the end of the season. In the third stage, 8 clubs (3 from the promotion group and 1 each from 5 classificaiton groups) played one-leg play-off games in [[Konya AtatÃ¼rk Stadium|Konya]] to determine the third team to be promoted to First League[http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/9495/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives] 3 March 2010.. [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group 3 consisted of 10 teams and finished first stage at ninth place. In classification group, team finished 6th and could not play promotion play-off games. ===Ranking group performance=== Mersin Ä°Y's league performance in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] Group 3 in [[1994â95 Turkish Second Football League|1994â95]] season is shown in the following tableStandings and results from [http://www.tff.org/Default.aspx?pageID=807&grupID=253#grp TFF second league page]. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !rowspan=2|place !rowspan=2|team !colspan=4|games !colspan=2|goals !rowspan=2|points !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|home !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|away |- !
